====================
 coopr.os CHANGELOG
====================

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.0.2
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Updating the solver plugin to initialize with a default problem and
  results format.

- Disabling this solver, until it's actually setup.

- py3k fixes

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.0.1
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Omiting a test that isn't reproducible on different platforms.

- Update to setup.py

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.0
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Initial release.
